properties.name: endpoints.configprops.keys-to-sanitize
properties.description: The keys that should be sanitize. Keys can be simple strings that the property ends with or regex expressions.

properties.description: The keys that should be sanitize. Keys can be simple strings that the property ends with or regex expressions.

properties.name: spring.git.properties
properties.description: Resource reference to a generated git info properties file.

properties.name: spring.pidfile
properties.description: The location of the PID file to write (if ApplicationPidFileWriter is used).
